name: Eternal Mahjong
summary:
Eternal Mahjong takes the hugely popular tile-matching game to new heights. Mahjong can be played casually to pass the time or with more focus to sharpen your puzzle solving kills. The game learns your style and adjusts to bring you a fresh challenge with each play.
Play this no-pressure free mahjong game at your own pace. This is a single player Solitaire style mahjong game, also known as Shanghai Mahjongg, Taipei Mah-Jong or Kyodai.
